text: Dotawo was a Christian kingdom in Lower Nubia (northern Sudan and southern Egypt) in the Middle Ages. It is attested in Old Nubian documents from the 12th to the 15th centuries. It’s one of the last attested Christian states to survive in modern-day Sudan. == See also == *Joel of Dotawo == References == *Adams, William Y.
